title: Price Hill Living Logo
author: Jamo

comments.content:
'Price Hill': [Mission Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131615/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=mission_script), donation-ware by James T. Edmonson for Lost Type Co-op  
'LIVING': a hunch only, [Neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131615/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface)/ [Neutraface 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131615/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface2) to get a /G with a right-sided flat section and a pointy /N
